step2.desc: After each work session, take a 5-minute break to recharge

step3.desc: After 4 work sessions, reward yourself with a 15-minute break

step1.desc: Add tasks in the left sidebar. Estimate how many pomodoros each will take.

step4.desc: Watch your completed pomodoros add up and celebrate your productivity!
